game.ai.shared.player.factory

Class PairsPlayerFactoryChoices

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.player.factory.PairsPlayerFactoryChoices

  • public class PairsPlayerFactoryChoices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class to create randomly PairsPlayerSpecification with 3 modes:
    Mode 1: AIPlayer and AIPlayer
    Mode 2: HumanPlayer and AIPlayer
    Mode 3: HumanPlayer and HumanPlayer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairsPlayerFactoryChoices() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IPairsPlayerFactory getFactory()
      There are 3 modes of IPairsPlayerFactory
      Mode 1: Create a TwoAIPairsPlayerFactory with AIPlayer and AIPlayer
      Mode 2: Create a HumanAIPairsPlayerFactory with HumanPlayer and AIPlayer
      Mode 3: Create a TwoHumanPairsPlayerFactory with HumanPlayer and HumanPlayer
      static int getMode()
      Return a Integer from 0 to 3
      static PairsPlayerSpecification getRandomPairsPlayer()
